data.eml:eml: Contributions to the taxonomy, identification, and biogeography of the Western Palaearctic species of Campoletis Förster (Ichneumonidae: Campopleginae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vas, Zoltán (2019): Contributions to the taxonomy, identification, and biogeography of the Western Palaearctic species of Campoletis Förster (Ichneumonidae: Campopleginae). Zootaxa 4565 (3): 373-382, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4565.3.4
